General characteristics.Propulsion: 2 × DS-71 cruise turbines | 2 × DT-59 boost turbines
General characteristics.Range: 4,850 nautical miles (8,980 km; 5,580 mi) at 14 knots (26 km/h; 16 mph) | 1,600 nautical miles (3,000 km; 1,800 mi) at 30 knots (56 km/h; 35 mph)
General characteristics.Armament: Anti-air missiles | 24 × Shtil-1 medium range missiles | 8 × Igla-1E (SA-16) | Anti-ship/Land-attack missiles | 8 × VLS launched Klub, anti-ship cruise missiles | Guns | 1 × 100 mm (3.9 in) A-190E naval gun | 2 × Kashtan CIWS | Anti-submarine warfare | 2 × 2 533 mm (21.0 in) torpedo tubes | 1 × RBU-6000 (RPK-8) rocket launcher
General characteristics.Aircraft carried: 1 Ka-28 Helix-A, Ka-31 Helix B or HAL Dhruv
